dialogue.line: Have you heard of that new dating game? What was it called... Hating Simulator?
Yeah, I'm probably not gonna play it though.
But I'm guessing you already bought it, huh?
Yep! Even the DLCs!
Hah, good luck dealing with all those overused romance tropes.
Meh, I've gotten used to them at this point.
Man, she’s so pretty and popular... I wish there was some way I could catch her attention.
Hmm…
Oh! I know!
I’ve been meaning to try out my rapping skills for a while now.
That’s sure to impress her!
I just need to find the right opponent…
Hmm…
I guess I’ll go for Tac.
He's the nicest guy here, so I'm sure he'll go easy on me.
Hey, Tac!
Oh, hi! You’re one of the members of the Music Club, right?
Haha yeah...
Say, you up for a rap-battle? Just for fun?
Oh, well… I’m not very good at rapping haha-
Tac, the love of my life is literally sitting a few meters away.
I need to impress her.
Oh!
You got it!
